dialogue.text: Alright, you had your fun Mr. Mute. Now you have 5 seconds to tell me why I shouldn’t finish you off right now.
Oh you're bold, huh? I see you like danger... I like that.
Maybe you’re the one I was meant to be looking for. It’s a shame; we would’ve worked out together but I'm gonna have to kill you, now. oh well.
What do you mean you’re not scared of me? Your pants should be stupidly heavy right now. I’m gonna put a hurting on ya, real bad.
ohhhh yeahhhh! ahaha! how do you like that, huh? am i too hot for you??
awww look at those cute fingers... that poor skin, peeling off! AHAHA!
Stephanie: oh you little snot, you take that back! you think you can get outta this alive? not this-
oough... my stomach... HEY! Where are you going!? don't run from me!
